draw.mission_task_and_description: 3/2 CR Mortar Platoon Land Navigation 19-20FEB2025 Land Nav West

values: Personnel will be briefed on safety measures and panic azimuths.
Panic Azimuth is 90 degrees
Soldiers will start in Teams to mitigate weaker Soldiers being alone. Experienced Soldiers will teach new Soldiers and build their skills before they execute the lane by themselves.
Soldiers will carry phones wrapped in duct tape to be used in the event of an emergency.
In the case that a Soldier is still untrained after the first iteration, that Soldier will be paired with a leader to walk the next iteration.
PL/PSG will be roaming around the AO to ensure training is conducted to standard and safely.
At the conclusion of the iteration if not all Soldiers are back the following actions will occur.
Immediately the vehicles will sound their horns every 5 mins.
Soldiers will be briefed that at 15 mins after the conclusion of the event to open their phones and begin to contact their leadership.
At 20 mins contact teams will be pushed out to try to try to find the Soldiers dismounted. Additionally, vehicles will patrol main roads to see/pick up Soldiers.
RSO conducts effective briefs and supervision SLs OIC
RSO OIC

draw.overall_supervision_plan: The OIC, RSO, and range leadership will conduct a range safety brief prior to all training. The OIC and RSO are overall responsible for safety. However, safeties and instructors have the responsibility to be actively engaged in range activities and Soldier actions so as to mitigate risk at the lowest level possible and ensure overall safety for the training event. Safety Brief and inspections will also ensure all other mentioned risks are properly mitigated. At least one vehicle and medic or CLS person will be on site in the unlikely event of any serious injuries. If a Soldier receives an injury that renders them unable to make it to the Aid Station they will contact their leadership. A pusher team will be sent to retrieve the Soldier with a litter, litter bearers and a medic. Recommend approval.
